price: 4. Ama Qhuraan baaxoo kee fayya ittaah iro raqta qaranwa gine Rabbih xaquk obsime.
arabic: تَنزِيلٗا مِّمَّنۡ خَلَقَ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ ٱلۡعُلَى

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: tanzīlan mimman khalaqa al-arḍa wal-samāwāti al-ʿulā
